name: Amazing Dino World - Classic Platform Game for kids and adults
name_original: Amazing Dino World - Classic Platform Game for kids and adults
description:
Amazing Dino World Platform Game is a new classic platformer games. It a fun mini game with 12 levels of pleasure.
Easy for kids, adults will also be pleased to replay this classic style game of the 80's.

In the heat of the desert, humidity of the forest or coolness of the world, Dino must collect all the coins and avoid ennemies! You must also run and jump on moving platform. The goal is to survive by jumping on the head of your ennemies or shooting them with your special bullet.

RUN AND JUMP ON ENNEMIES TO SURVIVE!
In this classic platform games for free, you can jump on ennemies head to kill them, but try to avoid the spikey turtles! Jump on the moving platform to pass the water and break bricks to discover hidden coins!

COLLECT MONEY!
Shoot ennemies and collect more coins of gold. The more you advance, the more difficult levels will become.

KILL TO SURVIVE
Improve your skills, jump higher, beat all the ennemies in this cool games! It will be hard to put this one down.

Dino, Ennemies, Gold, Guns, what more could you want!? Play Super Dino World Platform Game now!

FEATURES:
- 12 levels of fun
- Moving platforms
- Breakable bricks for hidden coins
- Cute character
- HD graphics
- HD Quality Audio

Download and enjoy Super Dino World Platform Game !
